JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Responsibilities     6 to 8 years of total Development experience which includes at least 1 year in the use of Java8   Good knowledge in formulation and execution of SQL queries   Solid Knowledge in working on ORM, CDI, UI, and Test frameworks   Knowledge of using tools mentioned above (IDE, Build tools, CICD tools, servers, etc)   Knowledge of Docker, PCF, Kubernetes, Cloud-like Azure/AWS is an added advantage   Good experience working in the agile working environment   Good analytical and problem-solving skills   Good communication skills for English both verbal and written   Keen on skill upgrade and accountability to the fullest   Interested in working PoC on happening technologies   Prior experience of working in the health domain is a plus, but not mandatory    Requirements    Java/JEE v1.8 and above   MVC framework Struts or Spring MVC   ORM framework JPA implementation like Hibernate/Eclipselink   UI /Scripting technologies JSP, HTML, CSS, Javascript, AJAX   XML Transforming technologies XSLT, Xquery   XML, JSON    Enterprise Java Beans and JMS Queue   JEE Context Dependency Injection   Oracle Database and SQL query language   Agile development process SCRUM/Kanban   Microservices Architecture and Implementation Patterns
